text: One day a wolf was wandering in lonely places, at the time the sun was setting on the horizon. And he saw his shadow, and exclaimed, How shall the lion with such a height scare me? With thirty meters long, it will be easy for me to become king of the animals! And as he dreamed of his pride, a mighty lion fell upon him and began to devour him. And the wolf changed his mind, and said, My pride is the cause of my misfortune. Don't judge your virtues by the way your eyes see them.
title: El lobo orgulloso de su sombra y el león
author: nan Esopo
